elements.description:
Given: I open http://localhost:4000
Then: "New User" title appears
And: The Input form for the details exists
elements.name: Verify if the new user page is opened on start.

elements.description:
Given: I submit a empty new user form
Then: It stays in the "New User" page
Then: Toastr appears
elements.name: The Submitting of a Empty form fails

elements.description:
Given: I click profiles in http://localhost:4000
Then: "Profiles" title appears
And: "Edit User" title appears
And: "Delete this User" button appears
elements.name: Verify if the users are displayed.

elements.description:
Given: I press the delete button with empty  user form
Then: It stays in the "Profiles" page
elements.name: The Deleting of a Empty form fails
